api.user package¶

Submodules¶

api.user.model module¶

class api.user.model.User(*args, **values)¶

Bases: Document

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: DoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

id¶

A field wrapper around MongoDB’s ObjectIds.

objects¶

The default QuerySet Manager.

Custom QuerySet Manager functions can extend this class and users can add extra queryset functionality. Any custom manager methods must accept a Document class as its first argument, and a QuerySet as its second argument.

The method function should return a QuerySet , probably the same one that was passed in, but modified in some way.

password_hash¶

A unicode string field.

salt¶

A unicode string field.

to_dict()¶
username¶

A unicode string field.

api.user.service module¶

api.user.service.get_user_by_id(uid: str) → User | None¶

Return the user model by its id If no user found, return None

api.user.service.get_user_by_username(username: str) → User | None¶

Return the user model by its username If no user found, return None
